SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Category
This is a Class representing a Category of the application.
CategoryController
This is a class that controls the category Management window of the application.
CategoryJsonUtils
This class is used for the communication between the Category Repository and the JSON document.
CategoryRepository
This class is a repository of all the categories as well as the category maps (from name to id and reverse).
DelayedTaskPopUpController
This class is used to control the delayedTask pop up window.
MediaLabAssistant
Initial class that starts the application and opens the first controller and the first scene of the MediaLab Assistant.
MediaLabController
This class controls the MediaLab Assistant window.
Notification
This Class represents the Notifications of the application.
NotificationController
This is a class that controls the notification Management window of the application.
NotificationDisplayController
This class is used to control the notifications pop up window.
NotificationWrapper
This is a Class that assists us in showing the notification table in the MediaLabAssistant window and was created for ease of usage.
Priority
This is a Class representing a Priority of the application.
PriorityController
This is a class that controls the priority Management window of the application.
PriorityJsonUtils
This class is used for the communication between the Priority Repository and the JSON document.
PriorityRepository
This class is a repository of all the priorities as well as the priority maps (from name to id and reverse).
SearchController
This class is the controller of the Search window.
Task
This class represents a Task, the main element of the Task manager.
TaskController
This class represents the controller for the task management window.
TaskJsonUtils
This class is used for the communication between the Task Repository and the JSON document.
TaskRepository
This class is a repository of all the tasks as well as the notifications.
TaskStateUtils
This is an enumeration used to organise properly the state of the tasks in the application.
